thread.title: Co-Founder of KIPP Charter Schools Fired Over Sexual-Misconduct Allegations

author: Tawnell D. Hobbs
title: Co-Founder of KIPP Charter Schools Fired Over Sexual-Misconduct Allegations
text:
KIPP, the powerhouse charter-school network, fired its co-founder Mike Feinberg on Thursday following an investigation into allegations of sexual misconduct.
Mr. Feinberg couldn’t be reached for comment, but a news release from the charter stated that he “categorically denies any wrongdoing.”
